channel.title: Tokyo Japan on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Tokyo Japan on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Tokyo power outage maps
item.description: Due to extreme impacts of earthquake and tsunami on the Japanese electrical energy grid, power companies in Japan are putting into place scheduled outages to reduce their energy load. Sources Nikkei: Tokyo Electric Power Co. (9501) and Tohoku Electric Power Co. (9506) will implement planned power cuts on a rolling basis . Harvard: Japan Sendai Earthquake Data Portal. A team at the  Harvard Center for Geographic Analysis is collecting and publishing geospatial data about the earthquake. "Illuminating Japan" weblog gakuranman.
